text: Pokrovka-Ozerki () is a rural locality (a village) in Tyuryushlinsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 22 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 29 km from Sterlitamak, 11 km from Tyuryushlya. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Pokrovka-Ozerki
